SEARCH
Package view.userInterface

Class MenuButton

java.lang.Object
view.userInterface.Button
view.userInterface.MenuButton
Direct Known Subclasses:
HiddenButton
public class MenuButton extends Button
Class for Menu Buttons. They apply a specific Context when pressed.

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuButton

      public MenuButton(int menuIndex, int x, int y, String text, Context state)
      Creates a new Menu Button with given parameters.
      Parameters:
      menuIndex - index of buttons array where the button will be stored.
      x - width position
      y - height position
      text - to show on button
      context - Context to apply when pressed
